actions.committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

actions.in_committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Public Lands, National Parks.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Public Lands, National Parks and Forests

official_title: A bill to amend the National Trails System Act to require the establishment of interpretive sites for the Trail of Tears National Historic Trail.

summary.text: Amends the National Trails System Act to require the Secretary of the Interior to establish an interpretive site for the Trail of Tears National Historic Trail at each of the following locations: (1) Hopkinsville, Kentucky; (2) Fort Smith, Arkansas; (3) Trail of Tears State Park, Missouri; (4) Tahlequah, Oklahoma; and (5) Jonesboro, Illinois.

titles.title: A bill to amend the National Trails System Act to require the establishment of interpretive sites for the Trail of Tears National Historic Trail.
